title: ProcureData Fundamentals
subtitle: 4 federated trust layers: Presentation, Orchestration, Web3 Sovereignty and Secure Persistence — the architecture protecting every piece of data across 47 success stories.

chat.description: Ask about the 4-layer architecture, Trust Triangle, SSI, Data NFTs or how they apply across the 47 success stories.
chat.sectionSubtitle: Consult any aspect of the trust architecture with our expert agent on the 47 success stories.
chat.q1: How does the Trust Triangle work in ProcureData?
chat.q2: What is Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI) and how is it implemented?
chat.q3: How do Data NFTs and Smart Contracts work on Pontus-X?
chat.q4: How does RLS protect data in the persistence layer?
